A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A franchise caught between two philosophies: to move on from the old Star Wars and to shamelessly ape it while doing few new things of interest. All the risks they took were with its legacy; none with the new cast. It didn't pay off. Here we are 2/3rds of the way through a trilogy and the characters and setting feel less developed than A New Hope accomplished in one film\, yet it sees fit to undo the accomplishments of the cast of the original. The Marvel treatment isn't going to work.
